name: how have you been?
description:
a "how have you been?" jam game

originally i had something written here about how this is a stupid, dumb game, but the idea for the game made me laugh, and it made me happy to make it, and i think that's worth something.

get to the highest point in the room, and then look down.

wasd to move, shift to run, q or esc to quit

please play at a resolution of 1024x768, and please use sound!

sometimes i don't want to dive deep into how i'm feeling, or i do want to but don't have the energy. sometimes i just want or need to make a dumb joke and take a break.

if you wanna play some of my more ~*~serious~*~ games, here's one about trauma and triggers, here's one about a bunch of mental illness stuff, here's one about depression naps.

love you. thanks for visiting. bye.

music credits
